author: alec
name: PhisherMan
short: Protects users against phishing attacks using phisherman.gg
description: Protects users against phishing attacks using phisherman.gg
install_msg:
Thanks for installing!

For this cog to work, you'll need to get a phisherman API key. Right now they aren't widely available, but if you get one, use the `[p]set api phisherman key <key>` command to set it.
